Struct DBPFEntryDIR.DBDFItem

Namespace
csDBPF
Assembly
csDBPF.dll

Struct which represents one item in the DBDF directory list. Each item is a reference to a compressed entry in the DBPF file.

public readonly struct DBPFEntryDIR.DBDFItem
